description:
Autumn doesn’t have to mean the end of shirt dresses. Made from a soft organic cotton waffle knit, the Highline Crew Neck dress blends the comfort of your favourite shirt dress, with the coziness of your favourite oversized sweater.

  • Medium weight organic cotton waffle knit holds onto your natural warmth
  • Side slits give you more room to move
  • Pairs well with leggings on chilly days
  • tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that ten trees are planted for every article of clothing sold
name: tentree Highline Crew Neck Dress - Women's
